name: Falcon Survival Simulator 3D Free
description:
Try youself being a bird with Falcon Survival Simulator 3D! Be a wild falcon, hunt and fly around your territory!

Fly in the sky and live the life of a Falcon! Hunt animals to survive and explore wilderness as a bird! Meet other wild falcons to join your flock, battle against predators and hunt smaller animals to survive with this falcon simulator in 3D! Maintain health, hunger and energy rate to set up a flock of falcons!

Hunt down and fight your prey with Falcon Survival Simulator 3D! Battle against other falcons or recruit them to your flock! Fly to explore the sky, hunt a pey to survive ang enjoy being a wild falcon!

Falcon Survival Simulator 3D features:

Great bird survival simulator
Level up your falcons - fly, hunt and survive
Battle againts other wild animals
Explore wilderness
3D graphics

Try this falcon simulator to fly in the sky being the most powerfull bird predator, the falcon!

Great app for those who loves bird and animal simulators! Check Falcon Survival Simulator 3D and live the life of a wild falcon! Set up your own flock, hunt a prey, battle against other wild animals and have fun!
